alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 24 at 2:04AM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Beaches, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects such as lawn furniture.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
